trans-unit.source: Configuring Usage Rights for Azure Rights Management
trans-unit.target: Configuring Usage Rights for Azure Rights Management

trans-unit.source: When you set protection on files or emails by using Azure Rights Management (Azure RMS) and you do not use a template, you must configure the usage rights yourself.
trans-unit.target: When you set protection on files or emails by using Azure Rights Management (Azure RMS) and you do not use a template, you must configure the usage rights yourself.

trans-unit.source: In addition, when you configure custom templates for Azure RMS, you select the usage rights that will then be automatically applied when the template is selected by users, administrators, or configured services.
trans-unit.target: In addition, when you configure custom templates for Azure RMS, you select the usage rights that will then be automatically applied when the template is selected by users, administrators, or configured services.

trans-unit.source: For example, in the Azure classic portal you can select roles that configure a logical grouping of usage rights, or you can configure the individual rights.
trans-unit.target: For example, in the Azure classic portal you can select roles that configure a logical grouping of usage rights, or you can configure the individual rights.

trans-unit.source: Use this topic to help you configure the usage rights you want for the application you’re using and understand how these rights are interpreted by applications.
trans-unit.target: Use this topic to help you configure the usage rights you want for the application you’re using and understand how these rights are interpreted by applications.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists and describes the usage rights that Rights Management supports, and how they are used and interpreted.
trans-unit.target: The following table lists and describes the usage rights that Rights Management supports, and how they are used and interpreted.

trans-unit.source: In this table, the Common name is typically how you might see the usage right displayed or referenced, as a more friendly version of the single-word value that is used in the code (the Encoding in policy value).
trans-unit.target: In this table, the Common name is typically how you might see the usage right displayed or referenced, as a more friendly version of the single-word value that is used in the code (the Encoding in policy value).

trans-unit.source: The API Constant or Value is the SDK name for an MSIPC API call, used when you write an RMS-enlightened application that checks for a usage right, or adds a usage right to a policy.
trans-unit.target: The API Constant or Value is the SDK name for an MSIPC API call, used when you write an RMS-enlightened application that checks for a usage right, or adds a usage right to a policy.

trans-unit.source: Name in the Azure classic portal
trans-unit.target: Name in the Azure classic portal

trans-unit.source: Allows the user to modify, rearrange, format or filter the content inside the application.
trans-unit.target: Allows the user to modify, rearrange, format or filter the content inside the application.

trans-unit.source: It does not grant the right to save the edited copy.
trans-unit.target: It does not grant the right to save the edited copy.

trans-unit.source: As part of the Change and Full Control options.
trans-unit.target: As part of the Change and Full Control options.

trans-unit.source: In Office applications, this right also allows the user to save the document.
trans-unit.target: In Office applications, this right also allows the user to save the document.

trans-unit.source: Allows the user to save the document in its current location.
trans-unit.target: Allows the user to save the document in its current location.

trans-unit.source: As part of the Change and Full Control options.
trans-unit.target: As part of the Change and Full Control options.

trans-unit.source: In Office applications, this right also allows the user to modify the document.
trans-unit.target: In Office applications, this right also allows the user to modify the document.

trans-unit.source: Enables the option to add annotations or comments to the content.
trans-unit.target: Enables the option to add annotations or comments to the content.

trans-unit.source: This right is available in the SDK, is available as an ad-hoc policy in the RMS Protection module for Windows PowerShell, and has been implemented in some software vendor applications.
trans-unit.target: This right is available in the SDK, is available as an ad-hoc policy in the RMS Protection module for Windows PowerShell, and has been implemented in some software vendor applications.

trans-unit.source: However, it is not widely used and is not currently supported by Office applications.
trans-unit.target: However, it is not widely used and is not currently supported by Office applications.

trans-unit.source: Enables the option to save the content to a different file name (Save As).
trans-unit.target: Enables the option to save the content to a different file name (Save As).

trans-unit.source: Depending on the application, the file might be saved without protection.
trans-unit.target: Depending on the application, the file might be saved without protection.

trans-unit.source: As part of the Change and Full Control options.
trans-unit.target: As part of the Change and Full Control options.

trans-unit.source: This right also allows the user to perform other export options in applications, such as Send to OneNote.
trans-unit.target: This right also allows the user to perform other export options in applications, such as Send to OneNote.

trans-unit.source: Enables the option to forward an email message and to add recipients to the To and Cc lines.
trans-unit.target: Enables the option to forward an email message and to add recipients to the To and Cc lines.

trans-unit.source: Denied when using the Do Not Forward standard policy.
trans-unit.target: Denied when using the Do Not Forward standard policy.

trans-unit.source: Does not allow the forwarder to grant rights to other users as part of the forward action.
trans-unit.target: Does not allow the forwarder to grant rights to other users as part of the forward action.

trans-unit.source: Grants all rights to the document and all available actions can be performed.
trans-unit.target: Grants all rights to the document and all available actions can be performed.

trans-unit.source: Includes the ability to remove protection.
trans-unit.target: Includes the ability to remove protection.

trans-unit.source: Enables the options to print the content.
trans-unit.target: Enables the options to print the content.

trans-unit.source: As the Print Content option in custom permissions.
trans-unit.target: As the Print Content option in custom permissions.

trans-unit.source: Enables the Reply option in an email client, without allowing changes in the To or Cc lines.
trans-unit.target: Enables the Reply option in an email client, without allowing changes in the To or Cc lines.

trans-unit.source: Enables the Reply All option in an email client, but doesn’t allow the user to add recipients to the To or Cc lines.
trans-unit.target: Enables the Reply All option in an email client, but doesn’t allow the user to add recipients to the To or Cc lines.

trans-unit.source: Allows the user to open the document and see the content.
trans-unit.target: Allows the user to open the document and see the content.

trans-unit.source: Enables options to copy data from the document into the same or another document.
trans-unit.target: Enables options to copy data from the document into the same or another document.

trans-unit.source: As the Allow users with Read access to copy content custom policy option.
trans-unit.target: As the Allow users with Read access to copy content custom policy option.

trans-unit.source: In some applications it also allows the whole document to be saved in unprotected form.
trans-unit.target: In some applications it also allows the whole document to be saved in unprotected form.

trans-unit.source: Allows the user to see the policy that is applied to the document.
trans-unit.target: Allows the user to see the policy that is applied to the document.

trans-unit.source: Allows the user to change the policy that is applied to the document.
trans-unit.target: Allows the user to change the policy that is applied to the document.

trans-unit.source: Enables the option to run macros or perform other programmatic or remote access to the content in a document.
trans-unit.target: Enables the option to run macros or perform other programmatic or remote access to the content in a document.

trans-unit.source: As the Allow Programmatic Access custom policy option.
trans-unit.target: As the Allow Programmatic Access custom policy option.

trans-unit.source: Some applications group usage rights together into permissions levels, to make it easier to select usage rights that are typically used together.
trans-unit.target: Some applications group usage rights together into permissions levels, to make it easier to select usage rights that are typically used together.

trans-unit.source: These permisisons levels help to abstract a level of complexity from users, so they can choose options that are role-based.
trans-unit.target: These permisisons levels help to abstract a level of complexity from users, so they can choose options that are role-based.

trans-unit.source: Although these options often show users a summary of the rights, they might not include every right that is listed in the previous table.
trans-unit.target: Although these options often show users a summary of the rights, they might not include every right that is listed in the previous table.

trans-unit.source: Use the following table for a list of these permissions levels and a complete list of the rights that they contain.
trans-unit.target: Use the following table for a list of these permissions levels and a complete list of the rights that they contain.

trans-unit.target: Azure classic portal<html></html><html></html>Rights Management sharing application for Windows

trans-unit.target: Azure classic portal<html></html><html></html>Rights Management sharing application for Windows

trans-unit.target: Rights included in the default templates
